profile.name: Ricardo
profile.title: Staff Frontend Engineer
profile.description:
I'm **Ricardo Dom√≠nguez**, **frontend developer since 2015** and **based in Madrid**.

Within the different branches of programming I‚Äôve found in frontend development a perfect
match between my interest in refined visuals and my passion for software architecture.

I consider myself to be a decisive and pragmatic person, always trying to learn new things in
order to grow both personally and professionally.

I'm a big **Typescript and React fan** ü§ì, but I've also worked with **Vue.js** and migrated some projects from **Angular 1.x**.

Some of my notable achievements include:

- **Lead design and implementation** of the main app for *FounderNest*.
- Spearheaded the **expansion** of a design system from 15 engineers to **300 engineers** across multiple companies.
- **Proficient** in leading teams amidst **changing specifications** and **acceptance criteria**.
- Pioneered the use of **React hooks**, driving the **migration** of various apps to this modern approach.
- Engineered a **dynamic B2B paper store** featuring adaptive styles and customized copies for each client.
- Conducted a **major refactor** of tooling at *Packlink*, resulting in **dramatically reduced build times** from 1 minute to approximately **10 seconds**.
- **In-depth knowledge** of low-level JavaScript.
- Orchestrated and executed the **migration** of the main Packlink **SPA** from Angular.js to React through a **gradual "inside-out" approach**.

challenges.description:
In my role as a Staff Engineer, I blend product work with cross-functional responsibilities, focusing on technical innovation and optimization to drive performance and enhance user experience.

Some of my notable achievements include:

- Refactored and supported the **data management layer** in the search app at Eventbrite, **migrating** it from **Redux** to **react-query**.
- **Architected** the **migration** of the existing **MPA system** to a **SSR architecture** with **Next.js**.
- Enhanced the **design system** by integrating **design tokens** and leveraging existing technologies like **Shacdn UI**.

I undertook a multifaceted role that encompassed both product development and cross-functional leadership.

Notable achievements include:

- Conducting a **major refactor** of tooling at *Packlink*, significantly reducing build times from 1 minute to approximately **10 seconds**.
- Spearheading the **expansion** of a design system from 15 engineers to **300 engineers** across multiple companies.
- Orchestrating and executing the **migration** of Packlink's main SPA from Angular.js to React through a **gradual "inside-out" approach**.
- Authoring multiple code quality guides for data management, unit testing, and end-to-end testing.
- Improving core web vitals of the main SPA by reducing bundle size and optimizing resources.
- Leading multiple "tiger teams" for innovation research aimed at improving our chapter's quality standards.

In this role, my focus was on driving technical innovation, optimizing performance, and enhancing user experience through strategic decision-making and collaborative leadership.

As a Lead Frontend Engineer at Foundernest, I held a pivotal role in overseeing all frontend-related developments while also coordinating a small team of full-stack developers for occasional frontend tasks. Throughout my tenure, I transitioned towards becoming a more T-shaped developer, actively participating in small full-stack developments and contributing to various aspects of the product lifecycle.

Given the dynamic nature of a startup, I embraced flexibility and willingly assisted multiple roles outside of my comfort zone. Additionally, I provided valuable support to the product team, gaining insights into agile development methodologies and emphasizing the importance of delivering incremental improvements.

Notable achievements during this time include:

- Designing and implementing the main app for [FounderNest](https://www.foundernest.com/) using technologies such as Typescript, React, Redux Sagas and Styled components.
- Implementing backend APIs using Typescript, Node.js and Express
- Providing support to the product team by defining acceptance criteria and user stories using JIRA, as well as contributing to UX/UI definition using Zeplin.

In this role, I demonstrated strong leadership in frontend development while also expanding my skill set to encompass backend development and contributing significantly to the product team's efforts.

As a Frontend Engineer in my first startup experience, I embarked on a journey of continuous learning and growth, immersing myself in Vue.js, testing methodologies, clean code practices, and product development principles. This role primarily involved product-focused tasks, where I played a significant role in shaping the user experience and functionality of the application.

This immersive experience in a startup environment equipped me with the adaptability, resilience, and entrepreneurial mindset essential for navigating the challenges and opportunities in the dynamic world of technology startups.

As an Associate Frontend Developer at MrMilu, a digital agency specializing in consulting and digital transformation, I developed projects using React and Vue.js. This role involved working closely with clients to understand their needs and translate them into effective solutions. Through client interactions and project collaborations, I honed both technical skills and client-facing abilities, contributing to successful digital transformation initiatives.

As an IoT researcher, I explored Industry 4.0 and IoT communication protocols in embedded systems, focusing on enhancing efficiency and connectivity in industrial processes. I conducted extensive research, collaborated on prototyping innovative solutions, and evaluated IoT protocols' suitability for various applications.

manfredSpecificData.desiredJobDescription:
I am deeply motivated by organizations that exemplify strong and transparent leadership. I believe in working with companies that feel like cohesive teams rather than adrift ships, ones that have a clear direction and purpose behind their decisions. I've learned from past experiences that transparency and communication are vital for maintaining morale and driving success.

Moreover, I highly value flexibility in the workplace and respect for work-life balance. Being able to efficiently manage my responsibilities while still having time for personal pursuits enhances both my productivity and overall well-being.

By aligning myself with companies that prioritize these principles, I am confident in my ability to contribute meaningfully to their goals while also nurturing my own professional and personal growth.
